content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase **free pattern available on my blog here https //www 1dogwoof com/diamond-clusters-crochet-cardigan-free-pattern/ the diamond clusters cardigan is an easy crochet project that features a simple diamond motif and minimal seaming you can work 75% of the project with one continuous strand of yarn free pattern includes written instructions for 5 sizes the paid pdf includes instructions on how to alter for custom sizes the digital pdf is formatted for printing comes as an instant download and features - a supply list with links for purchasing - abbreviations used - pattern notes - full written instructions - stitch chart - size schematic - custom sizing instructions - helpful photos and diagrams - no advertisements or comments ……………………………………………………………………………… patterns are written in us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
